GoogleÂ¶

Velruse supports authentication and authorizing users with Google services using both their hybrid OpenID+OAuth1.0 and their OAuth2.0 protocols. Users may choose which to implement, or both.

  • Google Hybrid (OpenID+OAuth) - velruse.providers.google_hybrid
  • Google OAuth2.0 - velruse.providers.google_oauth2

Next topic

Google Hybrid (OpenID+OAuth) - velruse.providers.google_hybrid
